<h3 id="X11826">X(11826)&nbsp;=&nbsp;HOMOTHETIC CENTER OF THESE TRIANGLES: ABC-X(3) REFLECTIONS AND INNER-JOHNSON</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; 2*a^7-2*(b+c)*a^6-3*(b-c)^2*a^5+(b+c)*(3*b^2-2*b*c+3*c^2)*a^4-4*b*c*(b^2+c^2)*a^3+(b^2-c^2)^2*(b-c)^2*a-(b^2-c^2)^3*(b-c)  :  :
<br>
<b>X(11826) = 2*(R-r)*X(3)-(R-2*r)*X(11)</b>
<p>X(11826) lies on these lines:{2,10893}, {3,11}, {4,1329}, {5,2077}, {8,2829}, {12,6923}, {20,2894}, {30,40}, {35,6907}, {36,10948}, {55,6850}, {56,6948}, {104,3813}, {165,5445}, {182,10794}, {376,10785}, {377,11496}, {382,6244}, {404,7681}, {515,10914}, {516,3878}, {517,1770}, {528,944}, {550,10943}, {601,1834}, {631,10598}, {946,11112}, {958,6938}, {962,5330}, {1001,6897}, {1158,3419}, {1385,3058}, {1478,10306}, {1482,5434}, {1593,11390}, {1753,3575}, {1837,3359}, {2475,7680}, {2886,6906}, {3035,6941}, {3098,10871}, {3523,10584}, {3560,3925}, {3576,11373}, {3579,7491}, {3583,6922}, {3585,5537}, {3816,6940}, {3826,6920}, {3901,5844}, {4294,6916}, {4312,7982}, {4413,6893}, {4421,10786}, {4999,6950}, {5046,10724}, {5217,6825}, {5225,6926}, {5432,6842}, {5584,6868}, {5687,6256}, {5693,5696}, {5881,7992}, {6684,11113}, {6690,6937}, {6769,9579}, {6891,10896}, {6925,10522}, {6955,10531}, {6958,7173}, {7991,10483}, {9581,10270}, {10057,11010}, {10829,11414}, {10919,11824}, {10920,11825}, {10949,11249}</p>
<p>
X(11826) = midpoint of X(7991) and X(10483)<br>
X(11826) = reflection of X(i) in X(j) for these (i,j): (6284,3), (7491,3579), (11827,40) <br>
</p>
